SEARCH
Package bto.Controller

Class ApplicantController

java.lang.Object
bto.Controller.ApplicantController
public class ApplicantController extends Object
Controller class for managing applicant-related operations, such as viewing projects, submitting applications, and handling enquiries.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicantController

      public ApplicantController(User applicant, ApplicationDao applicationDao, ProjectDao projectDao, EnquiryDao enquiryDao)
      Constructs an ApplicantController with the specified dependencies.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The user associated with this controller.
      applicationDao - The DAO for managing applications.
      projectDao - The DAO for managing projects.
      enquiryDao - The DAO for managing enquiries.

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableProjects

      public List<Project> getAvailableProjects()
      Retrieves a list of projects available for the applicant.
      Returns:
      A list of visible projects.

    • getAllApplications

      public List<Application> getAllApplications()
      Retrieves all applications submitted by the applicant.
      Returns:
      A list of applications associated with the applicant.

    • applyProject

      public void applyProject(String projectName, String flatType) throws Exception
      Submits an application for a project with the specified flat type.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project to apply for.
      flatType - The type of flat to apply for.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the application cannot be submitted.

    • viewActiveApplication

      public Application viewActiveApplication() throws Exception
      Retrieves the active application for the applicant.
      Returns:
      The active application.
      Throws:
      Exception - If no active application is found.

    • withdrawApplication

      public void withdrawApplication() throws Exception
      Requests withdrawal of the active application.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the application cannot be withdrawn.

    • submitEnquiry

      public void submitEnquiry(String projectName, String details)
      Submits an enquiry for a project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project to submit an enquiry for.
      details - The details of the enquiry.

    • viewEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> viewEnquiries()
      Retrieves all enquiries submitted by the applicant.
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries associated with the applicant.

    • editEnquiry

      public void editEnquiry(int enquiryId, String newDetails) throws Exception
      Edits the details of an existing enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to edit.
      newDetails - The new details for the enquiry.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the enquiry cannot be edited.

    • deleteEnquiry

      public void deleteEnquiry(int enquiryId) throws Exception
      Deletes an existing enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to delete.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the enquiry cannot be deleted.
